blocks.content: Define subgroup sum (inner direct product of subgroups). (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lsm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(clsm, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), crn(cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s1), cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lsm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ LSSum =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0)), s2 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶ ran((s3 ‚àà s1, s4 ‚àà s2 ‚Ü¶(s3[(+ ` s0)]s4)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-pj1
blocks.content: Define the left projection function, which takes two subgroups ` t , u ` with trivial intersection and returns a function mapping the elements of the subgroup sum ` t + u ` to their projections onto ` t ` . (The other projection function can be obtained by swapping the roles of ` t ` and ` u ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pj1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cpj1, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cmpt(s3, co(cv(s1), cfv(clsm, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), crio(s4, cv(s1), wrex(s5, cv(s2), wceq(cv(s3), co(cv(s4), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s5)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pj1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ proj1 =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0)), s2 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà(s1[(LSSum ` s0)]s2)‚Ü¶ iota(s4 ‚àà s1, ‚àÉ(s5 ‚àà s2, s3 =(s4[(+ ` s0)]s5))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
}

blocks.name: lsmfval
blocks.content: The subgroup sum function (for a group or vector space). (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), diffsc(s2, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), diffsc(s2, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), diffsc(s3, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), diffsc(s3, c4))
  syl5eq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))), cfv(clsm, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsm, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clsm, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))), cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3))))))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3)))), cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  rneqd(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3))), cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpt2eq3dv(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  df-lsm(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  mpt2ex(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))))
  pwex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c3)
}

thm lsmfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3)))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSSum ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3))))), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3))))), d(s1, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3))))), d(s2, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3))))), d(s2, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3))))), d(s3, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3))))), d(s3, c4))
  syl5eq(c2, (s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3)))), (LSSum ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (LSSum ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3)))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clsm, (s0 ‚àà P(c3), s1 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3)))), (s0 ‚àà P((Base ` hs0)), s1 ‚àà P((Base ` hs0))‚Ü¶ ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[(+ ` hs0)]s3)))))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, P((Base ` hs0)), P((Base ` hs0)), ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[(+ ` hs0)]s3))), P(c3), P(c3), ran((s2 ‚àà s0, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[c4]s3))), hs0 = c0)
  pweqd((Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)

blocks.name: lsmvalx
blocks.content: Subspace sum value (for a group or vector space). Extended domain version of ~ lsmval . (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmvalx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c3)), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clsm, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c3), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))))
  sylan9eq(co(c2, c5, c4), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))), co(c2, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))), c4), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c3)))
  oveqd(c2, c5, c4, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  lsmfval(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0, c1, c5, c3, c6)
  syl2anbr(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c3), wceq(co(c2, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))), c4), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))), wcel(c2, cpw(c3)), wcel(c4, cpw(c3)))
  elpw2(c2, c3)
  elpw2(c4, c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  mpd3an3(wcel(c2, cpw(c3)), wcel(c4, cpw(c3)), wceq(co(c2, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))), c4), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))), wcel(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))), universe))
  syl(wa(wcel(c2, cpw(c3)), wcel(c4, cpw(c3))), wcel(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))), universe), wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))), universe))
  mpt2exga(s0, s1, c2, cpw(c3), c4, cpw(c3), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))
  rnexg(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))), universe)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c2, cpw(c3), c4, cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))), universe, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))))
  rneqd(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4)))
  mpoeq12(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1), c4, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

thm lsmub1x(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  ex(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(c0g, c3)), wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(c0g, c3)), cv(hs0)), wcel(c3, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), c1, c0, wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mndrid(c3, cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(c0g, c3))
  syl32anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(c0g, c3)), co(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c3, cmnd), wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(c0g, c3), c2))
  ad2antlr(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cmnd))
  submrcl(c2, c3)

  ad2antlr(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c2, c1))
  submss(c2, c3, c1)
  simpr(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  ad2antlr(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(c0g, c3), c2))
  subm0cl(c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c3))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c3))
  lsmelvalix(c3, cmnd, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(cplusg, c3), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c4, c2))

  syl32anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), co(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c1, cmnd), wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  submrcl(c0, c1)

thm lsmval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1))), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsm, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  syl2an3an(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))), wcel(c1, cgrp), wss(c0, c5), wss(c2, c5))

blocks.name: lsmelvalmi
blocks.content: Membership of vector subtraction in subgroup sum. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmelvalmi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c4, c5)), wrex(hs0, c3, wrex(hs1, c5, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))))
  syl3anc(w0, wrex(hs0, c3, wrex(hs1, c5, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c5), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c1, c2)))
  eqidd(co(c0, c1, c2), w0)
  rspceov(hs0, hs1, c0, c3, c2, c5, co(c0, c1, c2), c1)
  lsmelvalm(hs0, hs1, co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: lsmsubg
blocks.content: The sum of two commuting subgroups is a subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)

thm lsmcom2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wss(c0, cfv(c3, c2))), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c2, c4, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccntz, c1))

  anidms(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c0), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))))
  lsmval(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c0, c2, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  frnd(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), c0, cxp(c0, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wf(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), cxp(c0, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c0))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c0))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c0))
  subgcl(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c0, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  anidms(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wss(c0, co(c0, c2, c0)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))

  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))

thm lsmlub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wb(wa(wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3)), wss(co(c0, c4, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c1))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wa(wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3)), wss(co(c0, c4, c2), c3))
  sylibd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wa(wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3)), wss(co(c0, c4, c2), c3), wss(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c3, c4, c3)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wi(wa(wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3)), wss(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c3, c4, c3))), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wa(wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3)), wss(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c3, c4, c3)))
  lsmless12(c3, c1, c3, c0, c2, c4)
  sseq2d(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c3, c4, c3), c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c3), c3))
  lsmidm(c3, c1, c4)
  jcad(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(co(c0, c4, c2), c3), wss(c0, c3), wss(c2, c3))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wi(wss(co(c0, c4, c2), c3), wss(c0, c3)), wss(c0, co(c0, c4, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wss(c0, co(c0, c4, c2)))
  lsmub1(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  sstr2(c0, co(c0, c4, c2), c3)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wi(wss(co(c0, c4, c2), c3), wss(c2, c3)), wss(c2, co(c0, c4, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wss(c2, co(c0, c4, c2)))
  lsmub2(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  sstr2(c2, co(c0, c4, c2), c3)
}

  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), (c3[c4]c3)= c3)

  syl((c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)‚àß c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)), ((c0[c4]c2)‚äÜ c3 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c3), c0 ‚äÜ(c0[c4]c2))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ(c0[c4]c2))

thm lssnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c3)))

} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wne(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  necon3bbid(c1, co(c1, c2, c0), w0, wss(c0, c1))
  syl6bb(w0, wss(c0, c1), wceq(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wceq(co(c1, c2, c0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c1, c2, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  lsmss2b(c1, c3, c0, c2)
  eqcom(co(c1, c2, c0), c1)
  syl(w0, wb(wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wne(c1, co(c1, c2, c0))), wss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  lsmub1(c1, c3, c0, c2)
  baib(wss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wne(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  df-pss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0))
}

blocks.origin:
thm lsmmod(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c0, c3)), wceq(co(c0, c4, cin(c2, c3)), cin(co(c0, c4, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c1))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, c4, cin(c2, c3)), cin(co(c0, c4, c2), c3), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c0, c3)))
  ssind(co(c0, c4, cin(c2, c3)), co(c0, c4, c2), c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c0, c3)))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c0, c3)), wss(co(c0, c4, cin(c2, c3)), co(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c2))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c0, c3)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c2))
  inss1(c2, c3)
  lsmless2(c0, c1, c2, cin(c2, c3), c4)
  mpbi2and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c0, c3)), wss(co(c0, c4, cin(c2, c3)), c3), wss(c0, c3), wss(cin(c2, c3), c3))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c0, c3)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c3))
  inss2(c2, c3)

blocks.content: Modular law dual for subgroup sum. Similar to part of Theorem 16.9 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:

} = {
  3eqtr3g(cin(c0, co(c2, c4, c3)), co(cin(c0, c2), c4, c3), cin(c0, co(c3, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c1)), c2)), co(c3, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c1)), cin(c0, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1))), wss(c3, c0)))

blocks.content: If two structures have the same components (properties), they have the same subspace structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2015.)

thm lsmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(LSSum ` c0)=(LSSum ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((LSSum ` c0), (LSSum ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c0)), hs1 ‚àà P((Base ` c0))‚Ü¶ ran((s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)))), (hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c1)), hs1 ‚àà P((Base ` c1))‚Ü¶ ran((s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)))), w0)
  3eqtr3d((hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c0)), hs1 ‚àà P((Base ` c0))‚Ü¶ ran((s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)))), (hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c1)), hs1 ‚àà P((Base ` c1))‚Ü¶ ran((s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)))), (hs0 ‚àà P(c2), hs1 ‚àà P(c2)‚Ü¶ ran((s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)))), (hs0 ‚àà P(c2), hs1 ‚àà P(c2)‚Ü¶ ran((s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)))), w0)

blocks.name: cntzrecd
blocks.content: Commute the "subgroups commute" predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cntzrecd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccntz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(c1, c0)))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wss(c2, cfv(c1, c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wss(c2, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c3)), wb(wss(c2, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  subgss(c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c3))
  subgss(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c3))
  cntzrec(c2, cfv(cbs, c3), c0, c1, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cntzrecd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Cntz ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2), c2 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2)), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3))
  syl2an(c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3), (c2 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2)), c2 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3), c0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3))
  subgss(c2, c3, (Base ` c3))
  subgss(c0, c3, (Base ` c3))
  cntzrec(c2, (Base ` c3), c0, c1, c3)
  eqid((Base ` c3))
}

blocks.name: lsmcntz
blocks.content: The "subgroups commute" predicate applied to a subgroup sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmcntz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, c4)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(c3, c4)), wss(c2, cfv(c3, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccntz, c5))
} = {
  bicomd(w0, wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, c4)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(c3, c4)), wss(c2, cfv(c3, c4))))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wa(wss(c0, cfv(c3, c4)), wss(c2, cfv(c3, c4))), wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, c4))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(csubg, c5)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, cgrp), wss(c4, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  subgrcl(c4, c5)
  subgss(c4, c5, cfv(cbs, c5))
  cntzsubg(c5, c4, cfv(cbs, c5), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  lsmlub(c0, c5, c2, cfv(c3, c4), c1)
}

thm lsmcntz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)‚äÜ(c3 ` c4)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ(c3 ` c4)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ(c3 ` c4))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSSum ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Cntz ` c5)
} = {
  bicomd(w0, (c0[c1]c2)‚äÜ(c3 ` c4), (c0 ‚äÜ(c3 ` c4)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ(c3 ` c4)))
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0 ‚äÜ(c3 ` c4)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ(c3 ` c4))‚Üî(c0[c1]c2)‚äÜ(c3 ` c4)), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), (c3 ` c4)‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  syl(w0, (c3 ` c4)‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c4 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  syl2anc(c4 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), (c3 ` c4)‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ‚àà Grp, c4 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5))
  subgrcl(c4, c5)
  subgss(c4, c5, (Base ` c5))
  cntzsubg(c5, c4, (Base ` c5), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c5))
  lsmlub(c0, c5, c2, (c3 ` c4), c1)
}

thm lsmcntzr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(c0, cfv(c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wa(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccntz, c5))
} = {
  3bitr3d(w0, wss(c0, cfv(c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wa(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c4))), wss(co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(c1, c0)), wa(wss(c2, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c4, cfv(c1, c0))))
  lsmcntz(c2, c3, c4, c1, c0, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wss(co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, co(c2, c3, c4)))), wss(co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(cbs, c5)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  syl3anc(w0, wss(co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c5, cmnd), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c5)), wss(c4, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c5, cmnd), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, cgrp))
  subgrcl(c0, c5)
  grpmnd(c5)
  lsmssv(c5, c2, cfv(cbs, c5), c4, c3)
  cntzrec(co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(cbs, c5), c0, c1, c5)
  anbi12d(w0, wss(c2, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c4, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wss(c2, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c5)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  subgss(c2, c5, cfv(cbs, c5))
  cntzrec(c2, cfv(cbs, c5), c0, c1, c5)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wss(c4, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(c1, c4))), wss(c4, cfv(cbs, c5)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  syl(w0, wss(c4, cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  subgss(c4, c5, cfv(cbs, c5))
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  subgss(c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c5))
  cntzrec(c4, cfv(cbs, c5), c0, c1, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
}

thm lsmcntzr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 `(c2[c3]c4))‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c4))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSSum ` c5)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Cntz ` c5)
} = {
  3bitr3d(w0, c0 ‚äÜ(c1 `(c2[c3]c4)), (c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c4)), (c2[c3]c4)‚äÜ(c1 ` c0), (c2 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0)‚àß c4 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0)))
  lsmcntz(c2, c3, c4, c1, c0, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c2[c3]c4)‚äÜ(c1 ` c0)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ(c1 `(c2[c3]c4))), (c2[c3]c4)‚äÜ(Base ` c5), c0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5))
  syl3anc(w0, (c2[c3]c4)‚äÜ(Base ` c5), c5 ‚àà Mnd, c2 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5), c4 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5))
  3syl(w0, c5 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ‚àà Grp)
  subgrcl(c0, c5)
  grpmnd(c5)
  lsmssv(c5, c2, (Base ` c5), c4, c3)
  cntzrec((c2[c3]c4), (Base ` c5), c0, c1, c5)
  anbi12d(w0, c2 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0), c4 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0), c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2), c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c2)), c2 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5), c0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5))
  syl(w0, c2 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  subgss(c2, c5, (Base ` c5))
  cntzrec(c2, (Base ` c5), c0, c1, c5)
  syl2anc(w0, (c4 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c0)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ` c4)), c4 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5), c0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5))
  syl(w0, c4 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5), c4 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))

blocks.name: lsmdisj
blocks.content: Disjointness from a subgroup sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c3, c1), csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, c4, c3), c1), csn(c2)))
} = {
  jca(w0, wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c3, c1), csn(c2)))
  eqssd(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2), w0)
  sseqtrd(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2), cin(co(c0, c4, c3), c1), w0)
  ssrind(c0, c1, co(c0, c4, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(c0, co(c0, c4, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  lsmub1(c0, c5, c3, c4)
  snssd(c2, cin(c0, c1), w0)
  elind(c2, c0, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  subg0cl(c0, c5, c2)
  eqssd(cin(c3, c1), csn(c2), w0)
  sseqtrd(cin(c3, c1), csn(c2), cin(co(c0, c4, c3), c1), w0)
  ssrind(c3, c1, co(c0, c4, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(c3, co(c0, c4, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  lsmub2(c0, c5, c3, c4)
  snssd(c2, cin(c3, c1), w0)
  elind(c2, c3, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))

thm lsmdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

blocks.name: lsmdisj3
blocks.content: Association of the disjointness constraint in a subgroup sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmdisj3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, c2, c1), c3), csn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ccntz, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cfv(c6, c1)))
} = {
  lsmdisj2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqtr3d(cin(co(c1, c2, c0), c3), csn(c4), cin(co(c0, c2, c1), c3), w0)
  ineq1d(co(c0, c2, c1), c3, co(c1, c2, c0), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), co(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)), wss(c0, cfv(c6, c1)))
  lsmcom2(c0, c5, c1, c6, c2)
  syl5eq(cin(c1, c0), csn(c4), cin(c0, c1), w0)
  incom(c1, c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ(c1[c2]c3))= { c4 })
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSSum ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c2]c1)‚ãÇ c3)= { c4 })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= { c4 })
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Cntz ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ(c6 ` c1))
} = {
  lsmdisj2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqtr3d(((c1[c2]c0)‚ãÇ c3), { c4 }, ((c0[c2]c1)‚ãÇ c3), w0)
  ineq1d((c0[c2]c1), c3, (c1[c2]c0), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[c2]c1)=(c1[c2]c0), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c0 ‚äÜ(c6 ` c1))
  lsmcom2(c0, c5, c1, c6, c2)
  syl5eq((c1 ‚ãÇ c0), { c4 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1), w0)
  incom(c1, c0)

blocks.name: lsmdisjr
blocks.content: Disjointness from a subgroup sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmdisjr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c3), csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, co(c1, c4, c3)), csn(c2)))
} = {
  sylib(w0, wa(wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c3), csn(c2))), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c0), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c3, c0), csn(c2))))
  lsmdisj(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl5eqr(cin(co(c1, c4, c3), c0), csn(c2), cin(c0, co(c1, c4, c3)), w0)
  incom(c0, co(c1, c4, c3))
  anbi12i(wceq(cin(c1, c0), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c3, c0), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c3), csn(c2)))
  eqeq1i(cin(c1, c0), csn(c2), cin(c0, c1))
  incom(c1, c0)
  eqeq1i(cin(c3, c0), csn(c2), cin(c0, c3))
  incom(c3, c0)
}

thm lsmdisjr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= { c2 } ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ c3)= { c2 }))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSSum ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ(c1[c4]c3))= { c2 })
} = {
  sylib(w0, ((c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= { c2 } ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ c3)= { c2 }), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c0)= { c2 } ‚àß(c3 ‚ãÇ c0)= { c2 }))
  lsmdisj(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl5eqr(((c1[c4]c3)‚ãÇ c0), { c2 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ(c1[c4]c3)), w0)
  incom(c0, (c1[c4]c3))
  anbi12i((c1 ‚ãÇ c0)= { c2 }, (c3 ‚ãÇ c0)= { c2 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= { c2 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ c3)= { c2 })
  eqeq1i((c1 ‚ãÇ c0), { c2 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  incom(c1, c0)
  eqeq1i((c3 ‚ãÇ c0), { c2 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ c3))

thm lsmdisj2r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), csn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, co(c3, c1, c2)), csn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c3, c2), csn(c4)))
} = {
  syl5eqr(cin(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), csn(c4), cin(c3, co(c2, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)), c0)), w0)
  eqtri(cin(c3, co(c2, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)), c0)), cin(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), cin(c3, co(c0, c1, c2)))
  ineq2i(c3, co(c2, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)), c0), co(c0, c1, c2))
  oppglsm(c2, cfv(coppg, c5), c0, c1, c5)
  incom(c3, co(c0, c1, c2))
  lsmdisj2(c3, c2, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)), c0, c4, cfv(coppg, c5), w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)))
  syl6eleq(c2, cfv(csubg, cfv(coppg, c5)), cfv(csubg, c5), w0)
  syl6eleq(c3, cfv(csubg, cfv(coppg, c5)), cfv(csubg, c5), w0)
  syl6eleq(c0, cfv(csubg, cfv(coppg, c5)), cfv(csubg, c5), w0)
  oppgsubg(c5, cfv(coppg, c5))
  oppgid(c4, cfv(coppg, c5), c5)
  syl5eq(cin(co(c2, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)), c3), c0), csn(c4), cin(c0, co(c3, c1, c2)), w0)
  eqtri(cin(co(c2, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)), c3), c0), cin(c0, co(c3, c1, c2)), cin(co(c3, c1, c2), c0))
  ineq1i(co(c2, cfv(clsm, cfv(coppg, c5)), c3), c0, co(c3, c1, c2))
  oppglsm(c2, cfv(coppg, c5), c3, c1, c5)
  eqid(cfv(coppg, c5))
  incom(co(c3, c1, c2), c0)
  syl5eqr(cin(c2, c3), csn(c4), cin(c3, c2), w0)
  incom(c3, c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)‚ãÇ c3)= { c4 })

  sseldd(c9, cfv(cbs, c3), c7, w0)

blocks.name: subgdisj2
blocks.content: Vectors belonging to disjoint commuting subgroups are uniquely determined by their sum. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)

thm subgdisj2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c6, c7), csn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c6, cfv(c5, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c8, c2, c0), co(c9, c2, c1)))
} = {
  subgdisj1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, c6, c8, c9, w0)
  syl5eqr(cin(c7, c6), csn(c4), cin(c6, c7), w0)
  incom(c6, c7)
  cntzrecd(c7, c5, c6, c3, w0)
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, c2, c8), co(c1, c2, c9), co(c8, c2, c0), co(c9, c2, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c8, c2, c0), co(c0, c2, c8)), wcel(c8, cfv(c5, c7)), wcel(c0, c7))
  sseldd(c8, cfv(c5, c7), c6, w0)
  cntzi(c8, c5, c7, c0, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c9, c2, c1), co(c1, c2, c9)), wcel(c9, cfv(c5, c7)), wcel(c1, c7))
  sseldd(c9, cfv(c5, c7), c6, w0)

thm subgdisj2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c9 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c7)

blocks.name: subgdisjb
blocks.content: Vectors belonging to disjoint commuting subgroups are uniquely determined by their sum. Analogous to ~ opth , this theorem shows a way of representing a pair of vectors. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)‚Üî(c0 = c3 ‚àß c2 = c4)))

blocks.name: pj1id
blocks.content: Any element of a direct subspace sum can be decomposed into projections onto the left and right factors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: pj1eq
blocks.content: Any element of a direct subspace sum can be decomposed uniquely into projections onto the left and right factors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

thm pj1eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clsm, c7))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(ccntz, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(csubg, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(csubg, c7)))

  eqeq1d(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(cfv(co(c4, c5, c6), c0), c2, cfv(co(c6, c5, c4), c0)), w0)
  mpdan(w0, wceq(c0, co(cfv(co(c4, c5, c6), c0), c2, cfv(co(c6, c5, c4), c0))), wcel(c0, co(c4, c8, c6)))
  pj1id(c0, c4, c8, c6, c5, c2, c7, c9, c10, w0)

blocks.name: pj1rid
blocks.content: The left projection function is the zero operator on the right subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pj1rid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c2, c3, c1), c0), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(ccntz, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c1), csn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(c8, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpj1, c6))
} = {
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c2, c3, c1), c0), c4), wceq(cfv(co(c1, c3, c2), c0), c0))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wa(wceq(cfv(co(c2, c3, c1), c0), c4), wceq(cfv(co(c1, c3, c2), c0), c0)), wceq(c0, co(c4, c5, c0)))
  eqcomd(c0, co(c4, c5, c0), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c4, c5, c0), c0), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  subgrcl(c2, c6)
  sselda(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c6), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  subgss(c1, c6, cfv(cbs, c6))
  grplid(c6, c0, cfv(cbs, c6), c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  pj1eq(c0, c4, c5, c0, c2, c3, c1, c6, c7, c4, c8, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c2, c1), csn(c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(c8, c1)))
  sselda(c0, c1, co(c2, c7, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(c1, co(c2, c7, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c6)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  lsmub2(c2, c6, c1, c7)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  subg0cl(c2, c6, c4)
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
}

  syl(w0, c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c6), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6))
  subgss(c1, c6, (Base ` c6))
  grplid(c6, c0, (Base ` c6), c4, c5)
  eqid((Base ` c6))
  pj1eq(c0, c4, c5, c0, c2, c3, c1, c6, c7, c4, c8, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))

  syl((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), c4 ‚àà c2, c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6))
